overview: Aaron, Brama, Charles and David are four friends who love motorbikes and freedom. 10 years passed they lived with their respective routines, because of an incident they agreed to take a touring trip from Jakarta across the island of Java to Bali. This trip could be their last trip together, because Aaron is getting married to Josephine at their destination, Bali. Their Touring event did not go smoothly, chaos ensued on the way. Aaron's friendship and marriage are at stake
title: Gas Kuy
